mapper.insert: insert into document (extension, name, content, uploadtime, size, flag) values (#{file.extension}, #{file.name}, #{file.content}, #{file.uploadTime}, #{file.size}, #{file.flag})

insert into notice ("publishTime", collage, title, content, flag, "documentId", type) values (#{notice.publishTime}, #{notice.collage}, #{notice.title}, #{notice.content}, #{notice.flag}, #{notice.documentId}, #{notice.type})
insert into resume(content, filename, extension, flag) values (#{resume.content}, #{resume.filename}, #{resume.extension}, #{resume.flag})
